00001 /*****************************************************************************
00002  * Project: RooFit                                                           
00003  * Package: BToDKTo3piK                                                     
00004  *    File: $Id: BdkDalitzSmear.cc,v 1.1 2006/03/20 19:04:31 fwinkl Exp $
00005  * Authors:                                                                  
00006  *   Frank Winklmeier, Colorado State University                             
00007  * Description:                                                              
00008  *   Class to smear a N-dim RooAbsPdf with M (M<=N) resolution PDFs          
00009  *   BdkDalitzSmear is not a fully functional RooAbsPdf itself.                    
00010  *   Only generate() can be used on it. I.e. does not support fitting.       
00011  *                                                                           
00012  * Copyright (c) 2006, Colorado State University                             
00013  *****************************************************************************/

00031 
00032 
00033 BdkDalitzSmear::BdkDalitzSmear(const char *name, const char *title,
00034                                BdkDalitzBase& pdf,
00035                                RooAbsPdf& res12, RooAbsPdf& res13,
00036                                RooAbsReal& m12, RooAbsReal& m13) :
00037   BdkDalitzBase(name,title),
00038   _pdf("pdf","original PDF",this,pdf),
00039   _resModels("resModels","proxy list of resolution models",this),
00040   _resVars("resVars","proxy list of resolution variables",this)
00041 {
00042   init();
00043   setEventBuffer();
00044 
00045   RooArgList resModels(res12,res13);
00046   RooArgList resVars(m12,m13);
00047   
00048   // Do some basic checks
00049   
00050   for (Int_t i=0; i<resModels.getSize(); i++) {
00051     if (!((RooAbsPdf&)resModels[i]).getParameters(RooArgSet())->contains(resVars[i])) {
00052       cout << "BdkDalitzSmear::BdkDalitzSmear(" << GetName()
00053            << ") pdf " << resModels[i].GetName()
00054            << " does not depend on "<<resVars[i].GetName() << " Ignored."
00055            <<endl;
00056       continue;
00057     }
00058     _resModels.add(resModels[i]);
00059     _resVars.add(resVars[i]);
00060   }
00061 }
00062 
00064 BdkDalitzSmear::BdkDalitzSmear(const BdkDalitzSmear& other, const char* name) : 
00065   BdkDalitzBase(other,name),
00066   _pdf("pdf",this,other._pdf),
00067   _resModels("resModels",this,other._resModels),
00068   _resVars("resVars",this,other._resVars),
00069   _events(other._events)
00070 {
00071   init();
00072 }
00073 
00075 BdkDalitzSmear::~BdkDalitzSmear()
00076 {
00077   clearEventBuffer();
00078 }
00079 
00080 void BdkDalitzSmear::init()
00081 {
00082   _pdfData = 0;
00083   _pdfEventsUsed = 0;
00084   clearEventBuffer();
00085 }
00086 
00087 void BdkDalitzSmear::clearEventBuffer()
00088 {
00089   // Clean up old datasets
00090   delete _pdfData;
00091   _pdfData = 0;
00092   _pdfEventsUsed = 0;
00093   
00094   for (Int_t i=0; i<_resData.size(); i++) delete _resData[i];
00095   _resData.clear();
00096   _resEventsUsed.clear();
00097 
00098   // Initialize empty datasets
00099   _resData.insert(_resData.begin(),_resModels.getSize(),(RooDataSet*)0);
00100   _resEventsUsed.insert(_resEventsUsed.begin(),_resModels.getSize(),0);
00101 }
00102 
00103 
00105 Double_t BdkDalitzSmear::evaluate() const
00106 {
00107   return 1;
00108 }

00110 
00112 RooAbsGenContext*
00113 BdkDalitzSmear::genContext(const RooArgSet &vars, const RooDataSet *prototype, 
00114                            const RooArgSet* auxProto, Bool_t verbose) const 
00115 {
00116   return new RooGenContext(*this,vars,prototype,auxProto,verbose,
00117                            (RooArgSet*)&_resVars) ;
00118   //                                     ^^^^^^
00119   //     This forces that our own generator is used for these variables
00120 }

00122 
00123 Int_t BdkDalitzSmear::getGenerator(const RooArgSet& directVars, RooArgSet &generateVars, Bool_t /*staticInitOK*/) const
00124 {
00125   if (matchArgs(directVars,generateVars,_resVars)) return 1 ;  
00126   return 0;
00127 }

00129 
00131 void BdkDalitzSmear::initGenerator(Int_t code)
00132 {
00133   assert(code==1);
00134   clearEventBuffer();
00135 }
00136 
00137 
00139 RooArgSet BdkDalitzSmear::getPdfData()
00140 {
00141   // generate PDF data if needed
00142   if (_pdfData==0 || _pdfEventsUsed >= _pdfData->numEntries()) {
00143     delete _pdfData;    
00144     _pdfData = ((RooAbsPdf*)_pdf.absArg())->generate(_resVars,_events);    
00145     _pdfEventsUsed = 0;
00146   }
00147    // get one entry from the PDF dataset
00148   RooArgSet vars(*_pdfData->get(_pdfEventsUsed++));
00149 
00150   return vars;
00151 }
00152 
00153 
00155 RooArgList BdkDalitzSmear::getResolutionData()
00156 {
00157   RooArgList resVals;
00158   for (Int_t i=0; i<_resVars.getSize(); i++) {
00159     // generate resolution data if needed
00160     if (_resData[i]==0 || _resEventsUsed[i] >= _resData[i]->numEntries()) {
00161       delete _resData[i];
00162       _resData[i] = ((RooAbsPdf&)_resModels[i]).generate(_resVars[i],_events);
00163       _resEventsUsed[i] = 0;
00164       }
00165     
00166     // get one entry from resolution dataset
00167     resVals.add(*_resData[i]->get(_resEventsUsed[i]++)->first());
00168   }
00169   return resVals;
00170 }
00171 
00172 
00174 void BdkDalitzSmear::generateEvent(Int_t code)
00175 {
00176   assert(code==1) ;
00177 
00178   // We need to do this until the smeared value is inside the Dalitz plot
00179   while (1) {
00180 
00181     // Original PDF value
00182     RooArgSet vars = getPdfData();
00183     Double_t m12Val =((RooRealVar*) vars.find(_resVars[0].GetName()))->getVal();
00184     Double_t m13Val =((RooRealVar*) vars.find(_resVars[1].GetName()))->getVal();
00185 
00186     // smear the value
00187     RooArgList resVals = getResolutionData();
00188 
00189     Double_t m12smear = m12Val + ((RooRealVar&)resVals[0]).getVal();
00190     Double_t m13smear = m13Val + ((RooRealVar&)resVals[1]).getVal();
00191     
00192     if (inDalitz(m12smear,m13smear)) {
00193       ((RooRealVar&)_resVars[0]).setVal(m12smear);
00194       ((RooRealVar&)_resVars[1]).setVal(m13smear);
00195       break;
00196     }
00197   }
00198 }
